Description: Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+ Complete Starter Kit
Notes: Complete kit includes: Raspberry Pi 3B+ board, 5V/2.5A power supply, 32GB microSD card with adapter, ABS case, heatsinks, HDMI cable

Description: 4.0 inch TFT LCD Touch Screen Display 480x320
Notes: SPI interface, resistive touch, ILI9488 driver chip, compatible with Raspberry Pi GPIO
2-layer PCB, includes 2x20 female header, 1x14 male header, 4x M2.5 mounting holes (min order 5 pcs)
